thread.title: Melrose Industries Wins Bruising Takeover Battle for Britain’s GKN

author: Robert Wall
title: Melrose Industries Wins Bruising Takeover Battle for Britain’s GKN
text:
LONDON—British turnaround specialist Melrose Industries PLC on Thursday won a bruising takeover battle for GKN PLC, thwarting a $6.1 billion bid by Ohio-based auto-parts maker Dana Inc. to combine with its U.K. rival.
GKN, one of Britain’s oldest businesses, in January rejected an unsolicited £7.4 billion ($10.5 billion) takeover offer from Melrose, saying it undervalued the company, which makes components for General Motors Co., Boeing Co. and Airbus SE.
